verses.name: 1 Kings 16:16
verses.text: And the people that were encamped heard say, Zimri hath conspired, and hath also slain the king: wherefore all Israel made Omri, the captain of the host, king over Israel that day in the camp.

verses.name: 1 Kings 16:17
verses.text: And Omri went up from Gibbethon, and all Israel with him, and they besieged Tirzah.

verses.name: 1 Kings 16:18
verses.text: And it came to pass, when Zimri saw that the city was taken, that he went into the palace of the king’s house, and burnt the king’s house over him with fire, and died,
